Label.en: These dungeons were the last point before people were sent off to the guillotine
Label.fr: Ces geôles étaient la dernière étape avant la guillotine...
Label.es: These dungeons were the last point before people were sent off to the guillotine
Label.zh: These dungeons were the last point before people were sent off to the guillotine

Label.en: Most famously during 'The Terror' period of the French Revolution
Label.fr: ...utilisée de façon particulièrement enthousiaste pendant 'La Terreur', les quelques années qui ont suivi la Révolution Française de 1789
Label.es: Most famously during 'The Terror' period of the French Revolution
Label.zh: Most famously during 'The Terror' period of the French Revolution

Label.en: It was 18th century France's death row!
Label.fr: L'équivalent fin XVIIIe du couloir de la mort !
Label.es: It was 18th century France's death row!
Label.zh: It was 18th century France's death row!

Label.en: These days, aside from being preserved as a monument, the conciergerie is primarily used for courts!
Label.fr: De nos jours, en dehors des parties qui se visitent, La Conciergerie est surtout utilisée pour héberger des tribunaux !
Label.es: These days, aside from being preserved as a monument, the conciergerie is primarily used for courts!
Label.zh: These days, aside from being preserved as a monument, the conciergerie is primarily used for courts!
